Polls can be wrong for lots of reasons: a biased sample, improper weighting or just plain sample variance.

The most common reason, tho, is that the universe hates you and wants you to be as miserable as possible before your inevitable death. #datascience #rstats #pydata

What working with bad code feels like. Sigh.
